name: Alfonzo B. SALLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY and its President Judge, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Salley v. Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia County

parties: Alfonzo B. SALLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY and its President Judge, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of September, 2015, the Application for Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

122 A.3d 1031
Alfonzo B. SALLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY and its President Judge, Respondent.
